text:
Switzerland, Zurich | ONSITE | Archilogic | Frontend | Full-time | EU or eligible to work in Switzerland

This might be a exciting, very well-paid opportunity. (Salaries in Zurich for developers are in the range of 6000 - 9.000 CHF / month after taxes.) We are an ETH spin-off and we just raised $1.5m in growth-funding. We are a team of seven people who solve hard problems on a daily basis. We are looking for engineers to expand our successful interactive 3D real estate technology.

Software engineer - fronted:

- Single page web application development

- 3D editor implementation

- Web development for mobile devices

- Performance optimization

- Co-designing UX and UI

More information about these jobs can be found here: http://about.archilogic.com/jobs/. Send us some work you're proud of to iwang@fastmail.net
